Description: Conical foot, handle and part of bowl of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice; glaze firedred-brown; white slip; interior glazed; exterior: top of handle and outside of foot glazed; in handle zone, on either side of handle, groups of vertical strokes between lines; inscription on underside of foot.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1031) (phase 2)
